ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Power Leveling
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Shadow_4unme, Sorry about the late reply. My internet has been down and I finally was able to get to it. (holidays and all, thank god they are almost over!)
ygData.messageBody:
Hi Shadow_4unme,

Sorry about the late reply. My internet has been down and I finally was
able to get to it. (holidays and all, thank god they are almost over!)

You are correct there. I have a friend that has joined because of me
and we did a little PL'ing of him. However I didn't go full bore but
more like "helped" him in some areas.

As of late I haven't had to much trouble finding groups between 20 and
40. But this may be a server thing. (I wonder if there are more of a
certain level on some servers than others?) I do run into times when I
can't find a darn thing and it sucks but then I just go work on
tradeskills (Like alcohol tolerance!)

I still say you had to have "some" armor on! LOL j/k and yes Druids do
rock. I have one I'm working on myself.

Happy Holidays!


EverQuest@yahoogroups.com wrote:
> Message: 1
> Date: Sun, 26 Dec 2004 03:19:52 -0000
> From: "shadow_4unme" <shadow_4unme@...>
> Subject: Re: Digest Number 1112
>
>
> some people do get into eq through a friend and thay do power lvl
> them. I seen a 65 cleric with epic who couldnt cast before oom. most
> the time however power lvling is done by experanced players. I have a
> friend who plays to about lvl 30 before deleting and starting
> another, he enjoys going from lvl 1 to lvl 30 in a day. It took all
> i could do to make him play one to 65. Dont get ripped on power
> lvling. When you have a lvl 70 with everything under the sun, I
> doubt you will want to sit lfg for 9 hours with a lvl 25 necro. Iam
> know lvl 51 and still see very few groups as the servers have fewer
> people on. As far as doing it naked its all about where you go and
> skill in doing it, have done it a few times and i know how. I think
> you may enjoy a druid so you will have the power to group power lvl
> and solo.
>
